title: Sketchbook Folio, "Landscape with Islands in Lake with Distant Mountain Range", 1885–1902
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: In right foreground, a tree-covered hill leading down to a large body of flat water with several small, tree-covered islands. In far distance, across water, a large mountain range.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Landscape with Islands in Lake with Distant Mountain Range", 1885–1902.
1885–1902. Graphite on cream wove paper. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-87-35.
